StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Discovering the Genetic Basis of Cleft Palate: CIDR

Person.Organization: EMORY UNIVERSITYUNIVERSITY OF IOWAUNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH AT PITTSBURGH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Funding support for the CPSeq Project was provided by several previous grants from the National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIDCR) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Funding for original data collection of DNA samples, phenotypic data, and analysis include: R01DE016148 (Marazita, Weinberg), R01DE009886 (Marazita), R21DE016930 (Marazita), R00DE022378 (Butali), R37DE008559 (Murray), R00DE024571 (Buxo-Martinez), R01DE014581 (Beaty), U01HG018993 (Beaty), R01DE011931 (Hecht), R01DE012472 (Marazita), Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Centers of Excellence No. U01DD001033 (Shaw). Additional recruitment was supported by the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation AMFDP Grant 72429 (Butali). Sequencing services were provided by the Center for Inherited Disease Research (CIDR). CIDR is fully funded through a federal contract from the National Institutes of Health (NIH) to The Johns Hopkins University, contract number HHSN2682017000061. This dataset can be found in dbGaP under phsXXXXXX.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Oral Clefts, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OC-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Oral Clefts. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OBDR-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Craniofacial Research, IRB, COL)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CFR-IRB-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Craniofacial Research. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Craniofacial and Eye Disorders)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CFED
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Craniofacial and Eye Disorders.
